title: [Feature]  SQL expression CONTAINS support
description:
Is Your Feature Request Related to a Problem?

For a long time, Alibaba Group has used SQL CONTAINS expressions internally to support complex business filtering logic.
Now we plan to introduce this feature into open source.

Describe the Solution You'd Like

SQL expression CONTAINS support.

Describe Alternatives You've Considered

None

Additional Context

No response
